body:
~The latest version doesn't have a configure script, so I just switched to using the standard GitHub release for now and depend on the autotools packages.

When https://github.com/vasi/squashfuse/issues/50#issuecomment-809176217 is addressed we can switch back to simple configure scripts and optional dependencies on autotools stuff.~ 

edit: this was fixed today.
title: Squashfuse new version and variants
